summary: A pistol-packing tomboy and her grandfather discover a band of bank robbing bandits taking refuge in the neighboring ghost town.
cast: Gregory Peck|Anne Baxter|Richard Widmark|Robert Arthur|John Russell|Harry Morgan|James Barton|Charles Kemper|Carlos Acosta|Robert Adler|Ray Beltram|Harry Carter|William Gould|Eula Guy|Paul Hurst|Victor Kilian|Norman Leavitt|Jay Silverheels|José Sáenz|Norm Taylor|Hank Worden|Chief Yowlachie
title: Cielo amarillo
